# description

**Instance Property**

A localized string describing the compass direction.

## Declaration

```swift
var description: String { get }
```

## Describing the compass direction

- **abbreviation**: A localized short abbreviation of the wind compass direction.
- **accessibilityDescription**: A localized accessibility description describing the compass direction.
